About Me

Bio

An enthusiastic, passionate and curious technophile/developer. Always looking for opportunities to learn, impove, challenge myself and (above all) help others using the skills I acquire.

The Past

Summarized origin story

Born and raised in Lagos Nigeria, I grew up toying with computers right from the windows '95 days, knowing I wanted to work with computers for the rest of my life. Went on to study the sciences, and graduated with a degree in computer engineering from the University of Benin, freelancing all the way.
